price: So he decided to exile them out of the land, but We drowned him and all those who were with him.
arabic: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
